snippet.title: Stalked in Solitude Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After a lot of hard work, my horror game I have been developing *Stalked in Solitude* is now nearing its release date of 3/3/2025. This short trailer gives a sneak peek at the game, without giving away too much about it. Hope you all enjoy it!

This trailer is made with real gameplay footage only.

*Music and SFX done by Palyze*

WISHLIST OUR GAME ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2775870/Stalked_in_Solitude/

To celebrate the release of my first-ever game, I will be giving away 5 Steam keys to allow some of you to get the game for free! Join our discord using the link below; more giveaway info will appear there!

Discord: https://discord.gg/99GctRXWa8

The giveaway will be held on 3/2/2025 and winners will receive their Steam keys on the release date! Good luck!
